name: beautyorange-wp-commentator-wall
author: leo

sections.description:
A plugin for WordPress, show the all commentators’s avatar.

Source

= CheckOut =
Use this command to anonymously check out the latest project source code:

svn checkout http://svn.beautyorange.com/code/beautyorange-wp-commentator-wall/trunk/ beautyorange-wp-commentator-wall-read-only

Browse

http://trac.beautyorange.com/code/browser/beautyorange-wp-commentator-wall
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the plugin
  2. Use <pre class=”commentator-wall“> and </pre> tag, and post it
